workAndExperience.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science (Game & Mobile Development)

projects.name: Recreation of Lightner's Live
projects.desc:
Lightners Live, a segment from Toby Fox's Deltarune, is a short rhythm game that appears during Chapter 3 of the game.

I aim to recreate this segment of the game with a few extra additions of my own, such as additional songs, compatibility with Lightners Live Plus custom maps, a slightly different approach to song/map difficulty, and more.

projects.name: FPS Prototype - Graveborn
projects.desc: Within a month, I have developed a small-scale game in a group of 5 people, with me leading the overall design and development of the game. We split the work by level design, enemy AI development, menus/UI, and other tasks amongst ourselves. We utilized Unity 3D to develop the game, using free public assets for the game, including character models, animations, particle effects, and VFX.

projects.name: VR Room
projects.desc:
A group project of a room in VR made in Unity. Within the room, users may interact with different objects, such as a vinyl record, a TV remote, tennis balls, and light switches.

This project was done for a university assignment and made use of GitHub Desktop for file sharing and version control. Communication was done primarily over Discord, and testing was done using both a Meta Quest 3 and Unity's XR simulator. Some of the assets used within the simulator were created by yours truly using Blender.

projects.name: Developer Portfolio
projects.desc:
Created as a way to showcase my projects, and brush up on Web Development, I present this website!

Initial planning and prototyping done using Miro, and coded entirely on VS Code.

projects.name: Custom Deltarune Cursors
projects.desc: Using aseprite, I created my own set of cursors, featuring several characters from Deltarune, allowing fans to change their own cursors into custom ones! Available for free on my Ko-Fi, with more to come in the future :)

aboutMe:
Born in the Philippines and raised (and currently residing in!) Macau SAR, I'm a graduate from the University of Wollongong, with a degree in Game & Mobile Development with Distinction. I've working with Android Studio and Unity in university, and am currently working on a personal project using Godot. I love experimenting with new ideas and learning new skills, both relevant and irrelevant to my field!

In my free time, I create lots of art, and have recently been experimenting with pixel art. I post the majority of my artwork as well as some WIPs on both Instagram and BlueSky! I also enjoy bouldering, weightlifting, and gaming! Feel free to throw me any roguelike suggestions!
